General.Name: Shanghai QiFan Cable Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai QiFan Cable Co., Ltd manufactures and sells wires and cables in the People's Republic of China. It offers building wires; low and medium voltage power cables; and fire resistant, solar, control, instrumentation, LAN, and VSD cables. The company also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Qifan Jetta Trading Co., Ltd. Shanghai QiFan Cable Co., Ltd was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.
